  Ma=
lice:

  He was trying to contain his emotion when Rodimus called to him, s=
aying Hellplague was wanting refuge.  That would make Blacknightmare stay, =
her dear sister...

  "On my way.  I will meet up with Wolfblade outside," =
he said, looking to his brother and Blacknightmare before leaving.

  Airly=
 <airly2002@...> wrote:
